tool_description: Maps relationships between languages within language families and traces word inheritance patterns across related languages.

family_scope.description: Scope of family analysis: immediate, branch, full_family

include_extinct.description: Include extinct languages in the mapping

error_messages: Language not recognized: The source language is not found in linguistic family databases.
Invalid scope parameter: Use 'immediate', 'branch', or 'full_family' for family_scope.
Insufficient family data: The language family information is incomplete or unavailable.
usage: Provide a source language and specify the scope of family relationships to map. The tool returns a structured representation of linguistic relationships and inheritance patterns.

language_family.description: Name of the primary language family

family_branches.description: List of language branches within the family

related_languages.description: Languages related to the source language

inheritance_patterns.description: Common word inheritance patterns across the family
